name: The Folklore Project
description:
It's all a conspiracy to keep you from going on your steak dinner date tonight. Somebody stole your fork and you need to get it back.

Controls:

Movement -AWDS

Turn Left/Right - Mouse 

Punch - Left-click mouse

Kick - Right-click mouse

Interact - E

Run up to the other NPC's in the game and interact with them to find out where your fork went. Eventually you'll meet someone who actually has your fork on the far side of the map, or does she?

Choose from a variety of choices when interacting with NPC's and get to the bottom of this folklore project.

Written and coded by NebulaRockets and T2Smiles (aka TechJunki)
